item.source:markdown: What is a White Coat Ceremony. https://t.co/qpNbjfGXGU

item.description:
A reporter asks if Jan 6 is a "bridge too far" for Trump as an at-large criminal (they didn't put it that way).

If it isn't what would be? If he nuked a major American city? Would that be enough to put him in jail.

When do people start listening to their own words.
item.source:markdown:
A reporter asks if Jan 6 is a "bridge too far" for Trump as an at-large criminal (they didn't put it that way).
If it isn't what would be? If he nuked a major American city? Would that be enough to put him in jail.
When do people start listening to their own words.

item.description:
@TaylorLorenz that's one of the cool things about my doctor's office, part of a huge system in ny and connecticut. they are super hardasses about masking, vaccines, boosters, distancing.

@TaylorLorenz it seems to me the washington post should be covering this. in the past news orgs would go on civic-minded campaigns like this, if i recall correctly (might've just been in the movies though).
item.source:markdown:
@TaylorLorenz that's one of the cool things about my doctor's office, part of a huge system in ny and connecticut. they are super hardasses about masking, vaccines, boosters, distancing.
@TaylorLorenz it seems to me the washington post should be covering this. in the past news orgs would go on civic-minded campaigns like this, if i recall correctly (might've just been in the movies though).

item.description: @w1111e depends where you're coming from. i grew up a few blocks from there. and coming from the north, i'd just go over the throggs neck bridge and you're right there.

item.description: @tanyaweiman @georgehahn @ZabarsIsNY oh man i am so wanting a ny bagel.
item.source:markdown: @tanyaweiman @georgehahn @ZabarsIsNY oh man i am so wanting a ny bagel.

item.description:
@XavierOnassis1 yes i do believe queens has the best bagels. not all hyped up by the manhattan bagels. their bagels are too damn big. a bagel is a modest food, not a flamboyant one.

@XavierOnassis1 Which borough has the best bagels?
item.source:markdown:
@XavierOnassis1 yes i do believe queens has the best bagels. not all hyped up by the manhattan bagels. their bagels are too damn big. a bagel is a modest food, not a flamboyant one.
@XavierOnassis1 Which borough has the best bagels?

item.description:
I might take a drive down to NYC this week to buy some bagels in Queens.

My favorite bagels place, opened way after I left -- but what they have is the basic Queens bagel.

https://t.co/PobPFuUqXE
item.source:markdown:
